other_tests.findings: Improvement on the Zung self-rating depression scale, two extrapyramidal rating scales, and handwriting samples.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Extrapyramidal symptoms showed considerable decreases after the second and third ECT treatments. After the last ECT, the Duvoisin scale showed a 59% improvement, and the Simpson scale showed a 40% improvement by the end of the treatment course. Depression improved only after the fifth ECT.
